title: SET_VEHICLE_AUTO_REPAIR_DISABLED
content:
0x5F3A3574// SetVehicleAutoRepairDisabled
void SET_VEHICLE_AUTO_REPAIR_DISABLED(Vehicle vehicle, BOOL value);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to set disable auto vehicle repair.value: Setting the value to  true prevents the vehicle from being repaired when a extra is enabled. Setting the value to false allows the vehicle from being repaired when a extra is enabled.Disables the vehicle from being repaired when a vehicle extra is enabled.
codeBlocks:
// SetVehicleAutoRepairDisabled
void SET_VEHICLE_AUTO_REPAIR_DISABLED(Vehicle vehicle, BOOL value);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for SET_VEHICLE_AUTO_REPAIR_DISABLED
SetVehicleAutoRepairDisabled(vehicle, false)
